resources.string: Configure and manage your database connections
Your app is up to date
If left empty, 000000000000 will be used as the API key
Location permission is required to scan WiFi networks.
Downloading new version of the app
Please enter a valid path or URL
Check for updates when app opens
App icon changed. Restart the phone to see changes.

Without direct file access permission, the app will need to copy SQLite files to its internal storage for each search, which may significantly slow down the process. However, the app will still function without this permission. With permission, SQLite files can be read directly from the phone\'s memory, allowing for instant database searches.
The app does not have direct access to files
You can grant file access permission anytime in the app settings. Please note that you may need to remove and re-add database files here after granting permission.

Direct access to the file is not available. The added database will be cached in the application for fast reading. This will take up an additional %1$.2f MB of phone memory. You can try granting direct file read permission and attempt to add the database again.
Failed to obtain direct access to the file. Your firmware or Android version may not allow direct reading of SQLite files. The database will be cached in the application.
The app has direct file access permission
Maximum number of points to send in one request. Default limit on all servers is 100, so it\'s recommended to keep it at 99.
Delay between split requests in milliseconds.
Enable caching of results to reduce server load and speed up repeated requests.
Try sending request to 3wifi.php?a=apiquery if the request to api/apiquery fails.
Enabling features in this section may cause application malfunctions, requiring a complete uninstall and reinstall. Change settings at your own risk.
The maximum number of points per request is set to more than 100. This may cause errors on some servers.
Do you want to test the server functionality?
Use POST requests instead of GET in WPS
Search by WiFi name or MAC address
Are you sure you want to clear the local database? This action cannot be undone.
Do you want to backup the database before clearing?
Database has been backed up and cleared
ROOT WPS connection not implemented yet
WPS is not supported on Android 10 and above.
Are you sure you want to enable WIP (Work in Progress) features? These features are not fully functional and may cause unexpected behavior.
App update to %1$s and database updates available
App, system and database updates available
Select databases to show points from
Zoom in to see WiFi points
At least one BSSID+ESSID pair required

By using this application, you agree to the following terms:

• You will only use this application on your personal networks or with explicit permission from the network owner

• This application is designed for checking personal network security and mapping free WiFi networks

• The application does not contain a built-in database of networks and does not collect any personal data

• The author takes no responsibility for any misuse of this application
Your app is now set up and ready to use!
Enabling indexing will speed up searching in large databases, but will slow down adding new networks.
To improve performance, it\'s recommended to create indexes for this database. Create now?
Direct path to database is missing
Select database to display points from
Database added. App restart may be required for full functionality.
It\'s recommended to index the database for faster searches, and indexes are required for map functionality. Index now?
Column mapping is missing for custom database
Are you sure you want to delete the indexes? If you\'re updating indexes, don\'t forget to create new ones after deletion.
Please wait. The process may take several minutes depending on the database size.
The level of aggressiveness for grouping points into clusters. Higher values create fewer clusters.
Maximum number of points in one cluster. If a cluster has more points, it will be split.
Indicates how close you need to zoom to the map to see markers. Low values allow you to see markers even when zoomed out.
Apply offset to points with identical coordinates
Enter a link to a community SmartLinkDB or use your own
Select SQLite database files saved in your device\'s memory
3WiFi type: A database compatible with the 3WiFi format, containing geo, nets or base tables and other relevant tables.
Custom type: Any SQLite database with an arbitrary structure, for which you can configure column mapping.
Enter a link to a 3WiFi API server
Adding an API server is not required for the application to function
The following permissions are required for the application to function correctly:
This permission is required to search for Wi-Fi networks and display them on the map. Without it, you will not be able to search for networks around you.
This permission is required to work with databases. Without it, database indexing will not be possible, and files will be cached inside the application, which will lead to double memory consumption.
You can change these permissions later in your device settings.
Location access permission is required to search for Wi-Fi networks and display them on the map. Without this permission, you will not be able to search for networks around you.
Without access to the location, the application will not be able to search for Wi-Fi networks around you and display them correctly on the map.
Without access to the file system, the application will cache all databases inside the application, which will lead to double memory consumption and slow operation.
Copy the network name and password, then click the button below to open Wi-Fi settings
Failed to suggest network to system

This is an outdated version of the generator. It only creates PIN codes but cannot determine whether a generated code works. To find a potentially working PIN code, please use the new version of the generator.

WIFI Frankenstein is an application for pintesting your wifi networks and working with wifi databases, displaying the location of wifi points on the map and much more. This is a Frankenstein application, which contains various functionality for working with wifi.
The application was created to replace the old 3WiFi Locator application.
Please enter a MAC address or network name
GET request is only available for single search
Retrying with GET request due to POST failure
The database is empty or no records match your search criteria
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Scan for WiFi networks first to see analysis
No WiFi data available. Please scan for networks first.
Pins generated for %d networks (%d with suggested pins)
Pins generated for %d networks (%d suggested, %d possible)
Pins generated for %d networks (%d with possible pins)
Location permission required for network scanning
PixieDust is a WPS attack that exploits weak randomness in some WPS implementations to recover the WPS PIN
This attack only works on networks with WPS enabled and vulnerable implementations
This tool is for educational purposes only. Only use on networks you own or have explicit permission to test. Unauthorized access to wireless networks is illegal.
AuthKey скрыт в логах - используется альтернативный ключ
Не удалось извлечь данные для атаки
Network is unreachable. Please check your connection.
Connection failed. Please try again later.
Generate QR code for WiFi connection
Password is required for secured networks
Insufficient data to generate QR code
Root access required to view saved passwords
This feature requires root access to read WiFi configuration files. Without root access, only basic network information will be available.
PIN не найден в выводе pixiedust
